Content:: Akmeemana Dayarathana Thero is a Sri Lankan politician[1] and a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. Thero was born in Akmeemana, Galle. His mother's name is Siriyawathi and his father was Mr. Sumatipala. Thero was in parliament from 2004 to 2010.  This article about a politician from Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
